text: geudeul-eun geuui tteus-e ttala geu leul wihae ilhamae gungjeon-eul mandeulgo dong sang-eul mandeulgo yeonmos gat-eun daeyaleul man deulgo hwalo-e gojeongdoen keun sot-eul man deul-eossnola geuleohamae dawis-ui jasondeul-a ilhamyeo gamsahala haessgeoneul nae jong-gaundeneun gamsahaneun jaga jeogdeola
